donate.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to give something, especially money, to a person or an organization in order to help them
donate.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Last year he donated $1,000 to cancer research.
donate.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to allow some blood or a body organ to be removed from your body so that it can be used in a hospital to help someone who is ill or injured
donate.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: people who volunteer to donate blood
donate.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to give money or something valuable to a person or organization in order to help them
donate.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Laurance S. Rockefeller donated $21 million to Princeton University for a center to study and teach human values.
